title: [Large-scale] Transitioning Face-to-face Science Courses to Online: Strengthening Team-based Instructional Design Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science education theories and experience in conducting in-person classes
context.additional_context: Learning how to transition face-to-face science classes to online formats through team collaboration, targeting pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can design strategies to apply core elements of face-to-face science classes to online environments through team-based collaboration.
Learners can diagnose educational issues arising during the transition to online classes and propose solution strategies using personal narrative analysis.
Learners can design project-based assessments in blended environments to effectively integrate theory and experiments in science subjects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
